articles.title: BCCI gives major update on Shreyas Iyer as India make 5 changes vs Bangladesh - Hindustan Times
articles.description: "Shreyas Iyer has shown improvement but he is not yet fully fit," said BCCI ahead of the India vs Bangladesh Asia Cup Super 4 match. | Cricket
articles.content: India made as many as five changes for their last Asia Cup Super 4 match against Bangladesh but there was no sign of Shreyas Iyer. In an official medical update, BCCI said that Iyer is recovering wel… [+3110 chars]

articles.title: Asia markets rise as parts of China's economy showed further recovery; Japan stocks near 33- year high - CNBC
articles.description: China's August retail sales and factory output beat expectations, but the print for fixed asset investment came in slightly below expected.
articles.content:
Asia-Pacific markets largely climbed, bolstered by a slew of China's economic data for August that were better than market expectations.
